Actions.Name: Create Short URL
Actions.Description: This action allows you to generate a Short URL or Tiny link for your long URL.

Actions.Name: Delete Short URL
Actions.Description: This action allows you to delete any existing Short URL which was created previously.

Actions.Name: Get All Short URL
Actions.Description: This action allows you to get list of all Short URL generated with specified Username and License Key

Actions.Name: Modify Short URL properties
Actions.Description: This action is allows you to modify/update properties for any existing Short URL.
